meanings.definition: In a contrary or opposite way.
meanings.sent1: She prefers tea; conversely, her sister likes coffee.
meanings.sent2: He is usually quiet; conversely, his brother is very talkative.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves to sleep all day; conversely, the dog is always full of energy.
meanings.sent4: The sun brings warmth; conversely, the moon brings a cool night.
meanings.sent5: The river flows downstream; conversely, the waterfall rushes upstream.

meanings.definition: In contrast or on the other hand.
meanings.sent1: She loves summer; conversely, he prefers winter.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading; conversely, my brother prefers watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The cake was delicious; conversely, the salad was bland.
meanings.sent4: Her room is always messy; conversely, his room is perfectly organized.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloom in spring; conversely, the leaves fall in autumn.
